channel.title: 笔记 on Hudson's Personal Pages

item.title: Notes
item.description:
-

WPF中CommoBox的用法案例

2022/04/11

下面的代码包含了XAML代码及C#代码

    <!-- myComboxBox 相当于这个类的类名 -->
    <Combox x:Name="myComboxBox" Grid.Column="1">
        <Combox.ItemTemplate>
            <DataTemplate>
                <stackPanel Orientation="Horizontal">
                <!-- 通过组合元素创建出丰富的dropdown类型 -->
                    <Image height="20" width="20" Source="c:\Temp\Tim.png"/>
                    <TextBlock Text="{Binding FirstName}"/>
                    <TextBlock Text=" "/>
                    <TextBlock Text="{Binding LastName}"/>
                <stackPanel>
            </DataTemplate>
        </Combox.ItemTemplate>
    </Combox>

ComboxBox XAML语法

    public partial class MainWindow:Window
    {
        public List<Person> people = new List<Person>();
        public MainWindow()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
            people.Add(new Person{FirstName="Tim",LastName="Corey"});
            people.Add(new Person{FirstName="Joe",LastName="Smith"});
            people.Add(new Person{FirstName="Sue",LastName="torm"});
        };
        myComboBox.ItemsSource = people;
    }
    public class Person
    {
        public string FirstName{set;get;}
        public string LastName{set;get;}
    }

$ 符号在C#字符串中的妙用

2022/04/11

    //字符串中的$用法
    int a = 10;
    string.Format($"Hello {a}");
    //Output Hello 0

MergedDictionaries的用法

2022/04/11

<ResourceDictionary xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
                    xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml">
    <ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries>
        <ResourceDictionary Source="/CustomControls/AnalogClockstyle.xaml"/>
    </ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries>
</ResourceDictionary>

Generic.xaml

winmm.dll可以用来播放mp3代码

2022/04/11

什么是数据模板（DataTemplate）

2022/04/11

DataTemplate is about the presentation of data and **is one of the many features** provided by the WPF styling and templating model. 下面是一个关于数据模板的简单案例 myTodoList是一个类 ```html ``` ---- ### 设置一个行内数据模板

2022/04/12

<ListBox Width="400" Margin="10"
         ItemsSource="{Binding Source={StaticResource myTodoList}}">
   <ListBox.ItemTemplate>
     <DataTemplate>
       <StackPanel>
         <TextBlock Text="{Binding Path=TaskName}" />
         <TextBlock Text="{Binding Path=Description}"/>
         <TextBlock Text="{Binding Path=Priority}"/>
       </StackPanel>
     </DataTemplate>
   </ListBox.ItemTemplate>
 </ListBox>

DataTriggers，即当数据等于特定数值时，触发该DataTrigger

2022/04/12

<!-- 如果TaskType为Home则BorderBrush为Yellow -->
<DataTemplate x:Key="myTaskTemplate">
    <DataTemplate.Triggers>
        <DataTrigger Binding="{Binding Path=TaskType}">
            <DataTrigger.Value>
                <!-- 这样可以访问本地变量 -->
                <local:TaskType>Home</local:TaskType>
            </DataTrigger.Value>
            <Setter TargetName="border" Property="BorderBrush" Value="Yellow"/>
        </DataTrigger>
    </DataTemplate.Triggers>
</DataTemplate>

统一定义Border内部TextBlock的字体颜色及字体大小颜色

2022/04/12

<!-- 定义其内部TextBlock的属性 -->
 <Border TextBlock.Foreground="red" TextBlock.FontSize="42" >
 </Border>

ControlTemplate的使用方法，TemplateBinding 的意思是将该属性绑定到父元素的该属性

Template is a dependency property of Control

<Style x:Key="DialogButtonStyle" TargetType="Button" >
    <Setter Property="Template">
        <Setter.Value>
            <ControlTemplate TargetType="{x:Type Button}">
                <Grid>
                    <Ellipse Fill="{TemplateBinding Background}"
                             Stroke="{TemplateBinding BorderBrush}"/>
                        <ContentPresenter HorizontalAlignment="Center"
                                          VerticalAlignment="Center"/>
                </Grid>            
            </ControlTemplate>
        </Setter.Value>
    </Setter>
</Style>

下面是使用该Style的方法

<Button Style="{StaticResouce DialogButtonStyle"/>

WPF中Resource指代的是什么

2022/04/12

分布于程序（Application）当中,且可以重复使用的对象叫做Resource,Resource一般有两种展示形式，分别为XAML Resources以及独立的Resources文件，Resource文件中可以包含Brushes及样式；

Solid Brushs Resource DEMO

    <!-- Key is the name of the solidColorBrush -->
    <SolidColorBrush x:Key="MyBrush" Color="#05E0E9"/>

使用代码将Resource赋予Button

Button btn;
btn.Background = (Brush)this.FindResource("MyBrush");

每一个Framework-level元素均包含一个Resources 属性，因此可以将任意属性赋予Framework-level Resources 属性类别是 ResourceDictionary，且该文件中包含resources的定义，resources通常定义在根元素中。

ContentControl 与ItemsControl

2022/04/12

//TODO

DataTemplates

2022/04/12

行内DataTemplate

<ListBox Width="400" Margin="10"
         ItemsSource="{Binding Source={StaticResource myTodoList}}">
   <ListBox.ItemTemplate>
     <DataTemplate>
       <StackPanel>
         <TextBlock Text="{Binding Path=TaskName}" />
         <TextBlock Text="{Binding Path=Description}"/>
         <TextBlock Text="{Binding Path=Priority}"/>
       </StackPanel>
     </DataTemplate>
   </ListBox.ItemTemplate>
 </ListBox>

独立的DataTemplate

2022/04/12

<!-- resource section -->
<Window.Resources>
    <DataTemplate x:Key="myTaskTemplate">
    <StackPanel>
        <TextBlock Text="{Binding Path=TaskName}" />
        <TextBlock Text="{Binding Path=Description}"/>
        <TextBlock Text="{Binding Path=Priority}"/>
    </StackPanel>
    </DataTemplate>
</Window.Resources>
<!-- end of section -->
<ListBox Width="400" Margin="10"
         ItemsSource="{Binding Source={StaticResource myTodoList}}"
         ItemTemplate="{StaticResource myTaskTemplate}"/>

注意上面的ItemsSource 与 ItemTemplate

分享resources与themes

2022/04/14

通过使用ResourceDictionary,在WPF中，可将一些列UI资源打包成theme的功能。

<ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries>
  <ResourceDictionary Source="Shared.xaml" />
</ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries>

如何使用Grasshopper制作动画

可以使用ScheduleSolution注册一个回调函数，下面是引用自Grasshopper开发者David Rutten的一段话:

Grasshopper will not redraw the viewports until the solution has finished. So you’re assigning different values to A, But they keep overwriting eath other until you’re done. Only then will there be a redraw; If you want to animate a result, you can choose to either do it through the available solution mechanism, which means scheduling a solution 200 milliseconds in the future, and during that solution outputting a new value, or you can choose to do your own cycling, but then you cannot output the value from your component, because that requires regular solutions.

下面是代码案例：

private void RunScript(int N, bool Run, ref object A)
{
  if (N != _maximum)
  {
    _maximum = N;
    _counter = N;
  }
  A = _counter;

  _run = Run;
  if (_counter < 0)
    _run = false;

  if (_run)
    GrasshopperDocument.ScheduleSolution(100, ScheduleCallback);
}

// <Custom additional code> 
private int _maximum = -1;
private int _counter = -1;
private bool _run = false;

private void ScheduleCallback(GH_Document document)
{
  _counter--;
  Component.ExpireSolution(false);
}

Rhino软件中创建工具栏

2022/04/14

在Rhino中创建工具栏的方和AutoCAD中类似，需要在软件中预先创建好RUI(tools–>toolbar Layout)文件（AutoCAD中创建的工具栏文件后缀为.cui 或.cuix文件），然后在软件安装时， 将其载入到Rhino软件中。通过要让Rhino软件在启动时自动加载工具栏.

Code-behind and the XAML Language

The XAML language includes language-level features that make it possible to associate code file with markup files.

To delect source changes, the source must implement a suitable property change notification mechanism such as INotifyPropertyChanged.

一个自定义控件的完整代码

2022/04/14

控件中的资源文件

<UserControl x:Class="Weather.UserControls.CardDay"
             xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
             xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
             xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006" 
             xmlns:d="http://schemas.microsoft.com/expression/blend/2008" 
             mc:Ignorable="d" Name="cardDay">
    <!---style的行内表达方式 -->
    <Border CornerRadius="10" Width="85" Padding="10" Margin="0 0 10 0" BorderThickness="1">
        <Border.Style>
            <Style TargetType="Border">
                <Setter Property="Background" Value="White" />
                <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="#e9e9e9" />
                <Style.Triggers>
                    <Trigger Property="IsMouseOver" Value="True">
                        <!--<Setter Property="Background" Value="#F6F6F6" />-->
                        <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="#03A9F4" />
                    </Trigger>
                </Style.Triggers>
            </Style>
        </Border.Style>
        <StackPanel>
            <TextBlock Text="{Binding Path=Day,ElementName=cardDay}" TextAlignment="Center" FontSize="14" FontWeight="SemiBold"/>
            <Image Source="{Binding Path=Source,ElementName=cardDay}" Width="30" Margin="0 10 0 10"/>
            <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" HorizontalAlignment="Center">
                <TextBlock Text="{Binding Path=MaxNum,ElementName=cardDay}" TextAlignment="Center" FontWeight="SemiBold" Margin="0 0 8 0"/>
                <TextBlock Text="{Binding Path=MinNum,ElementName=cardDay}" TextAlignment="Center" FontWeight="SemiBold" Foreground="#7a7a7a"/>
            </StackPanel>
        </StackPanel>
    </Border>
</UserControl>


using System.Windows;
using System.Windows.Controls;
using System.Windows.Media;

namespace Weather.UserControls
{
    public partial class CardDay : UserControl
    {
        public CardDay()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }
        //define propertity
        public string Day
        {
            get { return (string)GetValue(DayProperty); }
            set { SetValue(DayProperty, value); }
        }
        //
        // 1.You can't register same DP twice. To comply with this constraint you should use static variable, it will be initialized only one time thus you will register DP one time only.
        //2.DP should be registered before any class (which uses that DB) instance created
        //
        public static readonly DependencyProperty DayProperty = DependencyProperty.Register("Day", typeof(string), typeof(CardDay));
        public ImageSource Source
        {
            get { return (ImageSource)GetValue(SourceProperty); }
            set { SetValue(SourceProperty, value); }
        }
        public static readonly DependencyProperty SourceProperty = DependencyProperty.Register("Source", typeof(ImageSource), typeof(CardDay));
        public string MaxNum
        {
            get { return (string)GetValue(MaxNumProperty); }
            set { SetValue(MaxNumProperty, value); }
        }
        public static readonly DependencyProperty MaxNumProperty = DependencyProperty.Register("MaxNum", typeof(string), typeof(CardDay));
        public string MinNum
        {
            get { return (string)GetValue(MinNumProperty); }
            set { SetValue(MinNumProperty, value); }
        }

        public static readonly DependencyProperty MinNumProperty = DependencyProperty.Register("MinNum", typeof(string), typeof(CardDay));
    }
}
